duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, process, and move merchandise productively and accurately according to established guidelines to meet department standards.
Follow safety protocols and perform loading, unloading, scanning, packing, sorting, and stock replenishment activities.
Operate warehouse motor vehicles, including forklifts and pallet jacks, and maintain equipment according to procedures.
Enter data in systems, perform product counts and reconciliations, and ensure accuracy of location and production.
Maintain a neat and clean work area, adhere to company policies and training guidelines, and interact effectively with team members.
Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve problems using sound judgment and reasoning skills, escalate issues when required.
Perform physical tasks such as lifting materials, bending, stooping, and reaching throughout the workday, and work extended hours as required.
Wear safety equipment as necessary and adhere to location safety guidelines.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent work experience
